description: The provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in one or more of the geographical Areas listed in Annex A Statement of Work. This is a temporary contract, not exceeding one year, that may have a one-year renewal option. It includes a Volunteer Set Aside for Aboriginal Business
full_summary:
### **EW479-212627-E - Temporary Help Services - Southern Alberta**

#### Contract Details

| Field                  | Value         | French                         |
|------------------------|---------------|--------------------------------|
| Reference Number       | WS3994667811  | WS3994667811                  |
| Solicitation Number    | WS3994667811  | WS3994667811                  |
| Publication Date        | 2023-05-05     | 2023-05-05                     |
| Tender Closing Date    | 2023-05-24 14:00 EDT | 2023-05-24 14:00 HAE         |
| Contract Start Date    | 2023-06-01     | 2023-06-01                     |
| Contract End Date      | 2024-05-31     | 2024-05-31                     |

#### Tender Information

* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Services
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Tender Area

* **Regions of Delivery**: Medicine Hat, Lethbridge, Calgary
* **Sectors**: Temporary personnel services

#### Contract Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified offerors to submit bids for the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in one or more of the geographical areas listed in Annex "A" of the Statement of Work. This procurement includes a Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business.

Offerors should submit their bid and supporting documentation by **May 24, 2023, 14:00 EDT**, as specified in the tender document. Late bids will not be accepted.

Please note that the closing time for the tender has been modified. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 24, 2023 at 14:00 EDT.

For more information, please refer to the tender description document available on the Ariba Discovery website.

#### Contact Information

* Name: Hemy, Andrew (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

### Important Notice
